486210.name: 35MM - Soundtracks
486210.description:
Atmospheric soundtracks by Dmitry Nikolaev for "35MM". With the participation of Sergey Grishin

- Dmitry Nikolaev - Be Careful
- Dmitry Nikolaev - Abandoned Light
- Dmitry Nikolaev - Arrival
- Dmitry Nikolaev - Human Been
- Dmitry Nikolaev - In Trouble
- Dmitry Nikolaev - Memories
- Dmitry Nikolaev - Morning
- Dmitry Nikolaev - Night
- Dmitry Nikolaev - Tunnels
- Dmitry Nikolaev -Quiet Steps
- Dmitry Nikolaev, Sergey Grishin - Black Stone Gates
- Dmitry Nikolaev, Sergey Grishin - The War Begin
486210.supported_languages:
英语, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
